title: GPU dashboard
description: The dashboard helps detect GPU performance bottlenecks, thermal or power inefficiencies, and optimize resource utilization across your infrastructure.

953b08e7-5158-4806-b52e-8b58880b0cfd.title: Power (Watt)
953b08e7-5158-4806-b52e-8b58880b0cfd.description: Visualization to identify the Power over time

config.query:
WITH
    parseDateTimeBestEffort('{{filter.timeLimit.start}}') AS start_time,
    parseDateTimeBestEffort('{{filter.timeLimit.end}}') AS end_time,
    dateDiff('day', start_time, end_time) AS days_diff,
    dateDiff('year', start_time, end_time) AS years_diff,
    multiIf(
        years_diff >= 1, 'month',
        days_diff <= 1, 'hour',
        'day'
    ) AS date_granularity

SELECT
    MAX(power_draw) AS power_draw,
    MAX(power_limit) AS power_limit,
    request_time
FROM (
    SELECT
        ROUND(AVG(IF(MetricName = 'gpu.power.draw', Value, NULL)), 2) AS power_draw,
        ROUND(AVG(IF(MetricName = 'gpu.power.limit', Value, NULL)), 2) AS power_limit,
        formatDateTime(DATE_TRUNC(date_granularity, TimeUnix), '%Y/%m/%d %R') AS request_time
    FROM otel_metrics_gauge
    WHERE
        MetricName IN ('gpu.power.draw', 'gpu.power.limit')
        AND TimeUnix >= start_time AND TimeUnix <= end_time
    GROUP BY request_time
)
GROUP BY request_time
ORDER BY request_time

bab582ed-c163-4614-bec5-1b99d1157740.title: Memory (MB)
bab582ed-c163-4614-bec5-1b99d1157740.description: Visualization to identify the Memory in (MB) over time

config.query:
WITH
    parseDateTimeBestEffort('{{filter.timeLimit.start}}') AS start_time,
    parseDateTimeBestEffort('{{filter.timeLimit.end}}') AS end_time,
    dateDiff('day', start_time, end_time) AS days_diff,
    dateDiff('year', start_time, end_time) AS years_diff,
    multiIf(
        years_diff >= 1, 'month',
        days_diff <= 1, 'hour',
        'day'
    ) AS date_granularity

SELECT
    MAX(memory_available) AS memory_available,
    MAX(memory_total) AS memory_total,
    MAX(memory_used) AS memory_used,
    MAX(memory_free) AS memory_free,
    request_time
FROM (
    SELECT
        SUM(IF(MetricName = 'gpu.memory.available', Value, 0)) AS memory_available,
        SUM(IF(MetricName = 'gpu.memory.total', Value, 0)) AS memory_total,
        SUM(IF(MetricName = 'gpu.memory.used', Value, 0)) AS memory_used,
        SUM(IF(MetricName = 'gpu.memory.free', Value, 0)) AS memory_free,
        formatDateTime(DATE_TRUNC(date_granularity, TimeUnix), '%Y/%m/%d %R') AS request_time
    FROM otel_metrics_gauge
    WHERE
        MetricName IN (
            'gpu.memory.available',
            'gpu.memory.total',
            'gpu.memory.used',
            'gpu.memory.free'
        )
        AND TimeUnix >= start_time AND TimeUnix <= end_time
    GROUP BY request_time
)
GROUP BY request_time
ORDER BY request_time

8cd8b0f1-7661-4a0e-ada8-a7718d86700c.title: Avg Utilization Percentage (%)
8cd8b0f1-7661-4a0e-ada8-a7718d86700c.description: Visualization to identify the Avg Utilization Percentage over time

config.query:
WITH
    parseDateTimeBestEffort('{{filter.timeLimit.start}}') AS start_time,
    parseDateTimeBestEffort('{{filter.timeLimit.end}}') AS end_time,
    dateDiff('day', start_time, end_time) AS days_diff,
    dateDiff('year', start_time, end_time) AS years_diff,
    -- Apply JS logic in SQL: if ≥1 year → month, ≤1 day → hour, else → day
    multiIf(
        years_diff >= 1, 'month',
        days_diff <= 1, 'hour',
        'day'
    ) AS date_granularity

SELECT
    MAX(utilization) AS utilization,
    MAX(enc_utilization) AS enc_utilization,
    MAX(dec_utilization) AS dec_utilization,
    request_time
FROM (
    SELECT
        ROUND(AVG(IF(MetricName = 'gpu.utilization', Value, NULL)), 2) AS utilization,
        ROUND(AVG(IF(MetricName = 'gpu.enc.utilization', Value, NULL)), 2) AS enc_utilization,
        ROUND(AVG(IF(MetricName = 'gpu.dec.utilization', Value, NULL)), 2) AS dec_utilization,
        formatDateTime(DATE_TRUNC(date_granularity, TimeUnix), '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i') AS request_time
    FROM otel_metrics_gauge
    WHERE
        MetricName IN (
            'gpu.utilization',
            'gpu.enc.utilization',
            'gpu.dec.utilization'
        )
        AND TimeUnix >= start_time AND TimeUnix <= end_time
    GROUP BY request_time
)
GROUP BY request_time
ORDER BY request_time

0952942c-dd5a-484b-8449-224aef6264a8.title: Avg power draw
0952942c-dd5a-484b-8449-224aef6264a8.description: This defines average power drawn within the time period selected

config.query:
WITH
    parseDateTimeBestEffort('{{filter.timeLimit.start}}') AS start_time,
    parseDateTimeBestEffort('{{filter.timeLimit.end}}') AS end_time,
    (end_time - start_time) AS duration,
    (start_time - duration) AS prev_start_time,
    (end_time - duration) AS prev_end_time

SELECT
    round(avgIf(Value,
        TimeUnix >= start_time AND TimeUnix <= end_time AND MetricName = 'gpu.power.draw'
    ), 2) AS power_draw,

    round(avgIf(Value,
        TimeUnix >= prev_start_time AND TimeUnix <= prev_end_time AND MetricName = 'gpu.power.draw'
    ), 2) AS power_draw_previous,

    round(
        if(
            avgIf(Value,
                TimeUnix >= prev_start_time AND TimeUnix <= prev_end_time AND MetricName = 'gpu.power.draw'
            ) = 0,
            avgIf(Value,
                TimeUnix >= start_time AND TimeUnix <= end_time AND MetricName = 'gpu.power.draw'
            ) * 100.0,
            (
                avgIf(Value,
                    TimeUnix >= start_time AND TimeUnix <= end_time AND MetricName = 'gpu.power.draw'
                ) -
                avgIf(Value,
                    TimeUnix >= prev_start_time AND TimeUnix <= prev_end_time AND MetricName = 'gpu.power.draw'
                )
            )
            /
            avgIf(Value,
                TimeUnix >= prev_start_time AND TimeUnix <= prev_end_time AND MetricName = 'gpu.power.draw'
            ) * 100.0
        ), 2
    ) AS rate
FROM otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE
    MetricName = 'gpu.power.draw'
    AND TimeUnix >= prev_start_time AND TimeUnix <= end_time

c1e14dcc-d345-4201-9468-54cb73356dd4.title: Avg Temperature (°C)
c1e14dcc-d345-4201-9468-54cb73356dd4.description: Visualization to identify the Average Temperature over time

config.query:
WITH
    parseDateTimeBestEffort('{{filter.timeLimit.start}}') AS start_time,
    parseDateTimeBestEffort('{{filter.timeLimit.end}}') AS end_time,
    dateDiff('day', start_time, end_time) AS days_diff,
    dateDiff('year', start_time, end_time) AS years_diff,
    multiIf(
        years_diff >= 1, 'month',
        days_diff <= 1, 'hour',
        'day'
    ) AS date_granularity

SELECT
    ROUND(AVG(Value), 2) AS temperature,
    formatDateTime(DATE_TRUNC(date_granularity, TimeUnix), '%Y/%m/%d %R') AS request_time
FROM otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE
    MetricName = 'gpu.temperature'
    AND TimeUnix >= start_time AND TimeUnix <= end_time
GROUP BY
    request_time
ORDER BY
    request_time

fefb9f0e-5ee5-497a-b4e0-4e95a79c08c7.title: Fan Speed (0 - 100)
fefb9f0e-5ee5-497a-b4e0-4e95a79c08c7.description: Visualization to identify the Fan Speed over time

config.query:
WITH
    parseDateTimeBestEffort('{{filter.timeLimit.start}}') AS start_time,
    parseDateTimeBestEffort('{{filter.timeLimit.end}}') AS end_time,
    dateDiff('day', start_time, end_time) AS days_diff,
    dateDiff('year', start_time, end_time) AS years_diff,
    multiIf(
        years_diff >= 1, 'month',
        days_diff <= 1, 'hour',
        'day'
    ) AS date_granularity

SELECT
    ROUND(AVG(Value), 2) AS fan_speed,
    formatDateTime(DATE_TRUNC(date_granularity, TimeUnix), '%Y/%m/%d %R') AS request_time
FROM otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE
    MetricName = 'gpu.fan_speed'
    AND TimeUnix >= start_time AND TimeUnix <= end_time
GROUP BY request_time
ORDER BY request_time

74c4fc4b-c062-468d-b35b-8b7ea3aa0cbf.title: Average memory used
74c4fc4b-c062-468d-b35b-8b7ea3aa0cbf.description: This defines average memory used within the time period selected

config.query:
WITH
    parseDateTimeBestEffort('{{filter.timeLimit.start}}') AS start_time,
    parseDateTimeBestEffort('{{filter.timeLimit.end}}') AS end_time,
    (end_time - start_time) AS duration,
    (start_time - duration) AS prev_start_time,
    (end_time - duration) AS prev_end_time

SELECT
    round(avgIf(Value,
        TimeUnix >= start_time AND TimeUnix <= end_time AND MetricName = 'gpu.memory.used'
    ), 2) AS memory_used,

    round(avgIf(Value,
        TimeUnix >= prev_start_time AND TimeUnix <= prev_end_time AND MetricName = 'gpu.memory.used'
    ), 2) AS memory_used_previous,

    round(
        if(
            avgIf(Value,
                TimeUnix >= prev_start_time AND TimeUnix <= prev_end_time AND MetricName = 'gpu.memory.used'
            ) = 0,
            avgIf(Value,
                TimeUnix >= start_time AND TimeUnix <= end_time AND MetricName = 'gpu.memory.used'
            ) * 100.0,
            (
                avgIf(Value,
                    TimeUnix >= start_time AND TimeUnix <= end_time AND MetricName = 'gpu.memory.used'
                ) -
                avgIf(Value,
                    TimeUnix >= prev_start_time AND TimeUnix <= prev_end_time AND MetricName = 'gpu.memory.used'
                )
            )
            /
            avgIf(Value,
                TimeUnix >= prev_start_time AND TimeUnix <= prev_end_time AND MetricName = 'gpu.memory.used'
            ) * 100.0
        ), 2
    ) AS rate
FROM otel_metrics_gauge
WHERE
    MetricName = 'gpu.memory.used'
    AND TimeUnix >= prev_start_time AND TimeUnix <= end_time

17dda542-b991-455b-b92c-2a3ae74381ea.title: Avg utilization percentage
17dda542-b991-455b-b92c-2a3ae74381ea.description: This defines average utilization percentage within the time period selected

config.query:
WITH

    ), 2) AS utilization,

    round(avgIf(Value,

    ), 2) AS utilization_previous,

    round(
        if(
            avgIf(Value,

            avgIf(Value,

                avgIf(Value,
                    TimeUnix >= start_time AND TimeUnix <= end_time AND MetricName = 'gpu.utilization'
